items.question: How to sign up for the procedure
items.answer: You can sign up for the procedure through the form on our website, by calling, or writing to us on Instagram. We will contact you to confirm your appointment.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept payment in cash and cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). Payment is made after the service is provided.

items.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time. If canceled less than 24 hours in advance, a penalty of 50% of the cost of the service may be charged.

items.question: What materials do you use
items.answer: We use only certified premium materials from the world's leading brands. All pigments are hypoallergenic and safe for health.

items.question: Do your craftsmen have certificates?
items.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly take advanced training courses.

items.question: Is preparation necessary before the procedure?
items.answer: Yes, some procedures require preparation. We provide detailed recommendations upon registration.

items.question: Are there any contraindications to the procedures?
items.answer: Yes, each procedure has its own contraindications. Main: pregnancy, lactation, acute inflammatory processes, blood diseases, oncology. Before the procedure, consultation with a specialist is required.

items.question: Do you provide a guarantee for services
items.answer: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our services. If you are not satisfied with the result, contact us within 7 days and we will find a solution.

items.question: Do you have a loyalty program
items.answer: Yes, we have a cumulative loyalty program. After each visit you receive bonuses that can be used to pay for future visits.

items.question: Do you work on weekends
items.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week.

items.question: Is it possible to give a certificate for services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates for any amount or for specific services. Contact us to obtain a certificate.

items.question: Where is your salon located?
items.answer: We are located in the center of Dubai. Detailed information on how to get there can be found on the Contacts page.

items.question: How to sign up for the procedure?
items.answer: You can sign up online through the form on our website, by calling or writing to us on WhatsApp, Instagram.

items.question: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment by giving us at least 24 hours notice. Please notify us of changes in advance.

items.question: What materials do you use?
items.answer: We use only professional premium materials. All instruments undergo medical sterilization.

items.question: Do you do procedures with 4 hands?
items.answer: Yes, we value your time and can arrange for multiple procedures to be performed simultaneously.

items.question: Where are you located?
items.answer: Our salon is located in a convenient location with a beautiful view and a cozy atmosphere. You will find the exact address in the contacts section.

items.question: How to sign up?
items.answer: You can sign up via the website or WhatsApp.

items.question: Is there parking?
items.answer: Yes, we have free parking for customers.

items.question: What brands do you use?
items.answer: We use Luxio, Fedua and other premium brands.
